name: ChangelingVR
description:
ChangelingVR is a VR first-person interactive mystery built upon the ideas of magical realism and a sense of unease and wonder. You play as a detective named Aurelia, a dream-walker whose gift is the ability to see the thoughts and memories of anyone she touches. This gift makes you a family's last resort in figuring out what is wrong with their baby. As you make contact with each family member, you will see through the lens of their hopes and fears what is left of the baby.

Features
  • Gaze into the minds of anyone you touch and experience their thoughts and memories in virtual reality
  • Progress through a series of interconnected levels featuring unique mechanics as well as distinct themes and visual designs
  • Discover the rich narrative of ChangelingVR through different VR interactions, complex characters, and world exploration
  • Explore a breathtaking world featuring deep environmental interactions, puzzle solving, and level exploration
Additional Information

Anyone interested in learning more about our game is encouraged to check out our website at https://www.changelingvr.com/, and anyone interested in joining our community is encouraged to join our community discord at https://discord.gg/pTygdaWUTD. We hope you enjoy our game and we take any and all feedback into consideration!
